reference.title: Overview Text Functions
reference.shortdesc: An overview of some functions for texts.

section.title: MID
section.p: This function returns a specified number of characters from the middle of a supplied text string.

plentry.pd: Required. An integer that specifies the position of the first character that you want to be returned. The counting starts with 1.
Required. An integer that specifies the number of characters to be returned from the supplied text.

section.title: LEN
section.p: This function returns the length of a supplied text string.

plentry.pd: Required. The text string that you want to find the length of.

section.title: LEFT
section.p: This function returns a specified number of characters from the left of a supplied text string.

plentry.pd: Optional. The number of characters to be returned from the left of the supplied text string. If omitted the default value is 1.

section.title: RIGHT
section.p: This function returns a specified number of characters from the right of a supplied text string.

plentry.pd: Optional. The number of characters to be returned from the right of the supplied text string. If omitted the default value is 1.

section.title: SEARCH
section.p: This function returns the position of a specified text within a supplied text string.

plentry.pd: Required. The character or text string that you wish to search for.
Required. The text string that is to be searched.
Optional. The position from which the search should begin. If omitted the default value is 1.
